backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles with access control, wallet address validation, and CRUD-style profile operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing match‑3 related improvements, impacted files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file, especially match‑3 engine and UI screens.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH variable definitions plus base/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Simple HTML entry mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring authentication, routing, profile gating, theme provider, and layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with attribution, social links, and dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, login/logout logic, user menu, and game entry button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form creating a user name on first login with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/game/match3/engine.ts: Implements core match-3 logic including board initialization, adjacency checks, swapping, and match detection.
frontend/src/game/match3/types.ts: Defines match-3 constants and TypeScript types for tiles, the board, matches, and cascade results.
frontend/src/game/match3/useMatch3Game.t: React hook managing match-3 gameplay state, handling tile selection, swaps, cascades, scoring, and board resets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto-refetching queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, session handling, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls for user profile and wallet address operations using React Query with mutation helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables plus minor game-specific styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectWallet.tsx: UI page for viewing, validating, linking, updating, and removing a user’s wallet address with backend integration.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Renders the match-3 game UI, handling tile selection, display of the board, and fallback-safe tile image loading.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with authentication-aware greetings and a section promoting and linking to the Stone Match game.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, existing features, and tracked requirements for the Stone Match game.
